name: Storex
overview:
Created in 1989, STOREX is the main leader in the digital convergence, especially in the multimedia hard drives players and recorders. Beyond its unmatched technological innovation, rewarded in the Press, STOREX is the first actor offering an extended range of products with best quality/price rate, since years now. The full range of products offered by STOREX, covers all the market needs from external HDD, multimedia HDD players and recorders, DVBT receiver and recorders, MP3, MP4, USB sticks and different IT accessories.

STOREX is present through different distribution channels as : Computer electronic stores, Mass market, superstores, Internet stores, Specialized stores. Involved into a Safety and Quality policy, STOREX products answered to the European standard, (CE), environmental (RoHS, REACH). Our production line, controlled at each stage, allows us to offer you a guarantee of the highest manufacturing quality for whole products. The website offers to you the last update on the products, but also the newsletters. If you meet any problem installing a product please contact the Technical support, Hot-Line, or ask your question in the forum. Everything is done to provide the best service closest to you and meet your expectations.
